name: ChangePassword
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for updating the student password:

Request payload must contain the following fields:

user_id: STRING,
old_password: STRING,
new_password: STRING

Request:

PUT - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/students/changePassword

raw 
  {
    "user_id": "1",
    "old_password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs=",
    "new_password": "wHm6eGCL7uFOArs="
}

Response:

202 - Accepted 

  {"status":202,"status_type":"success","message":"User password updated","count":1,"data":[1]}
